name: RPS(RockPaperScissor)-Duel
description:
RPS(Rock Paper Scissor)-Duel alpha version 1.3.1

Instructions:

arrow_keys - for Menu

Enter - select Menu / Continue

W - Enable AI MODE

Z or A - Pick Rock

X or S - Pick Paper

C or D - Pick Scissor

NOTE: This version is not fully done, you may encounter some bugs/error, this game is still in development.
